faqs.question: What is multi-user accounting software?
faqs.answer: Multi-user accounting software for business enables multiple team members to access and collaborate on financial data in real time, ensuring smooth workflows and up-to-date information across departments.

faqs.question: Can I assign specific access to team members?
faqs.answer: Yes, Giddh allows you to assign custom access to team members based on roles. You can restrict access to specific accounting modules to maintain control and security.

faqs.question: How secure is the data shared in Giddh?
faqs.answer: Giddh uses advanced encryption and secure cloud accounting software storage to protect your financial data. The software also offers role-based access and time-limited sharing links for added security.

faqs.question: Is Giddh compliant with GST?
faqs.answer: Yes, Giddh is fully GST-compliant. It automatically calculates taxes and generates GST-ready reports, making tax filing easier for businesses in India.

faqs.question: How many users can Giddh support?
faqs.answer: Giddh supports unlimited users. You can add as many team members as needed and assign appropriate access, making it scalable for businesses of all sizes.

faqs.question: Is there any accounting software that allows multiple users?
faqs.answer: Yes, many accounting software solutions support multiple users. Giddh is a powerful, multi-user platform that enables seamless collaboration, providing customized access and real-time data sharing across teams.
